certifications.title: The Complete Full-Stack Web Development Bootcamp
certifications.summaryHtml: This course has been very important to gaining my web development skills. Prior to this, I had no knowledge on how to build a website and no knowledge of all the different frameworks involved. I can now happily say I am quite confident in using React.js, jQuery, JavaScript, API's, and many more web technologies that can bring great projects together

virtualWorkExperience.title: Springpod Investment Banking
virtualWorkExperience.summaryHtml: During this course, I learned that the primary focus of investment bakning is to help individuals, corporations, and governements raise capital, whilst securing the value of their original investment. As someone who would like to work within Asset Management, I found that an Elite Boutique Bank would be what I prefer over the other types of investment banks as they offer more specific services. It was also great to hear the different career opportunities, and the core values and skills required to best match the role of an investment banker. Fortunately, investment bankers are mainly young, being between 20-30 years of age, which is a great benefit.
